comments: First column of dual Wythoff array.Positions of 0 in A189479.
references: D. R. Morrison, "A Stolarsky array of Wythoff pairs," in A Collection of Manuscripts Related to the Fibonacci Sequence. Fibonacci Assoc., Santa Clara, CA, 1980, pp. 134-136.
N. J. A. Sloane and Simon Plouffe, The Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences, Academic Press, 1995 (includes this sequence).
links: Reinhard Zumkeller, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..10000
N. J. A. Sloane, Classic Sequences
formula: Floor(1+phi*floor(phi*(n-1)+1)), phi=(1+sqrt(5))/2, n >= 2.a(1)=1; for n>1, a(n)=a(n-1)+2 if n is already in the sequence, a(n)=a(n-1)+3 otherwise. - _Benoit Cloitre_, Mar 06 2003
maple: Digits := 100: t := (1+sqrt(5))/2; A007066 := proc(n) if n <= 1 then 1 else floor(1+t*floor(t*(n-1)+1)); fi; end;
prog: (Haskell)a007066 n = a007066_list !! (n-1)a007066_list = 1 : f 2 [1] where   f x zs@(z:_) = y : f (x + 1) (y : zs) where     y = if x `elem` zs then z + 2 else z + 3-- _Reinhard Zumkeller_, Sep 26 2014, Sep 18 2011
crossrefs: Cf. A064437. Apart from initial terms, same as A026356. Complement is (essentially) A026355. Equals 1 + A004957, also n + A004956.
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_, _Mira Bernstein_
